episodes.synopsis: Napoleon sends his army to invade Portugal and they march to the center of the country, where they encounter Gen. Wellington.
episodes.title: Depois da Batalha

episodes.synopsis: When French troops invade Coimbra, Lt. Pedro de Alencar makes a valiant effort to warn Gen. Wellington of the advancing French forces.
episodes.title: Terra Queimada

episodes.synopsis: French troops reach the Lines of Torres, and Gen. Wellington's strategy of lying in wait will finally be put to the test.
episodes.title: Torres Vedras

video.title: Linhas de Wellington
video.synopsis: This epic set during the Napoleonic Wars follows the lives of both the nobility and the poor as they navigate love, deceit, intrigue and violence.
